active_incidents.title: Some users might have trouble with posts

notes.body: Some users may be experiencing delay issues when creating and editing posts. We are investigating and we'll report back as soon as we have more information. Thank you for your patience in the meantime.
We're still investigating this issue impacting creating and editing posts. We appreciate your continued patience as we work towards a solution.
We are continuing to investigate this issue. Apologies for any disruption caused by this - we'll let you know as soon as we find out more.

Some users may be experiencing long delays when creating and editing posts. 

We're actively looking into this, and we'll report back as more information becomes available. We apologize for the disruption.

active_incidents.title: Spreadsheet data added using workflows may be incorrect

notes.body: We are still investigating an issue where using the workflow tool to add a row to a spreadsheet is mistakenly inserting incorrect time information, causing errors when attempting to retrieve spreadsheet data. We will let you know as soon as we have any updates. Thank you for your patience while we look into this.

We’ve identified an issue where using the workflow tool to add a row to a spreadsheet is mistakenly inserting incorrect time information, causing errors when attempting to retrieve spreadsheet data. We’re investigating and will let you know as soon as we know more. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
